This message outputs the traveled distance since last reset (see NAV-RESETODO) togetherwith an associated estimated accuracy and the total cumulated ground distance (can onlybe reset by a cold start of the receiver).

column7: GPS time of week of the navigation epoch.See the description of iTOW for details.
